body_html: Hopefully, this will be my last commit. I fixed the clang-format issue and removed the compile target override from the BUILD file. This means that the default build will compile the fallthrough code, but even that is ~2x faster than the code it replaces. We compile the NVIDIA containers with -march=sandybridge, which selects the SSE4.1 vectorized code path. I have tested that extensively, I ran 90 epochs with Alexnet, Googlenet and Resnet50, that's ~350 million random crop and resize calls with no failure. The image_grad_test passes for all the code paths in our container.

body: Hopefully, this will be my last commit. I fixed the clang-format issue and removed the compile target override from the BUILD file. This means that the default build will compile the fallthrough code, but even that is ~2x faster than the code it replaces. We compile the NVIDIA containers with -march=sandybridge, which selects the SSE4.1 vectorized code path. I have tested that extensively, I ran 90 epochs with Alexnet, Googlenet and Resnet50, that's ~350 million random crop and resize calls with no failure. The image_grad_test passes for all the code paths in our container.
